text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The candidate answer discusses FTC utilization generally in the final sentence but fails to state the specific concept required by the criterion: that the purpose of the FTC limitation is to ensure that foreign taxes on one type of income cannot be used to offset U.S. tax on another type of income (i.e., the separate limitation baskets).", "criterion_id": "9620eeef-a685-4f67-8c7e-caaed3794617"}
